https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r0HutwzEN8k5FnBpfSXQ43XEO4e.jpg it is a story of a skyscraper that has suddenly appeared in a town. The skyscraper looks down on the low-rise buildings and wants to stand out, causing fear and annoyance among the buildings around it. As a result, it is hated. And, the town goes under water by a sudden storm. Buildings
